message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $9,000? It's a fair price that reflects the value this product brings.
I appreciate your understanding, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9,000. I'd like to offer $8,200 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
